headline: YMCA sells sunflower art to support Ukraine
author: Kyle Alexander
sentences: “Sunflowers are indicative of Ukraine — the yellow of the sunflowers, the blue of the sky — that’s what their flag is, and it’s very pertinent to what the country stands for,” said Gray.
Suzanne Gray, who is half Ukrainian, is making the fundraiser happen, and said the sunflower is a significant symbol of Ukrainian culture.
Art will be sold to raise funds for YMCA Ukraine, which serves 26 cities in the country.
(WKBN) — The Davis Family YMCA is collecting art donations for Ukraine.
Donations will be accepted any time before or after that date.
Art kept pouring in for the fundraiser Monday morning.
It’s part of their Sunflowers for Ukraine fundraiser.
Any two-dimensional sunflower art is welcome.
Pieces go on sale on April 10.
